result.title: Infinitum June'14 -- HackerRank
result.content:
Hi!

Ad Infinitum is back with Infinitum June'14, a monthly contest restricted to mathematics domain, held on HackerRank.

Register at https://www.hackerrank.com/infinitum-jun14
The contest commences on 13th June 15:30 UTC. You are allowed to enter the contest anytime, for tie breaking the timer will start when you view the challenge, which allows you to start late at your convenience, but once started try to finish as fast as possible to be on top of the leaderboard :)

It's a 2 day contest with 8 problems (3 Easy, 3 Medium, 2 Hard)
Scoring Distribution: 20 20 20 40 60 80 100 120

problem statements in English, Russian and Chinese

Top 10 on leaderboard gets Cool HackerRank T shirt

Problem Setters
OoO000oOOOoOooOo
xorfire
darkshadows
amitp08
aisum
navabh
shashank21j (cakewalk :P)

Problem Tester
kevinsogo

Detailed editorials are written by kevinsogo exclusively and will be available as soon as the contest ends :) I suggest you to try all challenges and at the end of contest understand the solutions.

GL&HF
